text: Sousei no Aquarion is a action game-based video game released for the PlayStation 2 in Japan in 2005. It was developed by Sting Entertainment. It was published by Bandai. == Other websites == * Sousei no Aquarion - (GameFAQs) * Media - (GameFAQs) Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:PlayStation 2-only games Category:2005 video games Category:Action video games Category:Japan-exclusive video games
title: Sousei no Aquarion
